name: Stimmy Shapes
description:
Stimmy Shapes is a new sensory play experience designed to help reduce stress, regain focus, and restore calmness.

Everyone experiences stimming on some level, and its benefits can be extremely positive - especially for individuals on the spectrum. Stimming is known to reduce anxiety, ease transition(s), lessen sensory overload, and help restore a sense of control.

Features

- Super smooth, friction-free shape animation!
- Move multiple shapes at once with multi-touch support!
- Add or remove shapes at any time. Every click creates a new set of random shapes, so you never experience the same layout twice!
- Pick from carefully curated soft color palettes (red, purple, blue, green, and yellow)!
- AD FREE. All apps from KOA Interactive are ad free - and always will be!

Stim out with Stimmy Shapes!
